short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Chrome extension to display favorite AWS accounts at the top of the AWS Access Portal screen in the IAM Identity Center

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can display your favorite accounts at the top of the list of AWS accounts that appear on the AWS IAM Identity Center (formerly AWS SSO) portal screen.
